snippet: While the Miami Heat star Chris Bosh was celebrating his birthday, the police said thieves made off with about $340,000 in jewelry and cash from his home.
abstract: Police say that while Miami Heat star Chris Bosh was celebrating his birthday, thieves made off with about $340,000 in jewelry and cash from his home.
lead_paragraph: While the Miami Heat star Chris Bosh was celebrating his birthday, the police said thieves made off with about $340,000 in jewelry and cash from his home.

headline.seo: Thieves Steal From Home of Chris Bosh
